name: g-pysnc
short_description:
A module-based PyQt-User Interface to extract and download Infos of your Friends at different Sites (Xing, Facebook, StudiVZ / MeinVZ) using a pseudo-language and to serialize them into vCards/XML for Outlook or Kontact.
This is a G-Services-Project.

topic.fullpath: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: Social Networking
